title: Fish ladders reduce fish mortality due to dams

content.question: Which of the following is the most successful solution to the problem of fish mortality caused by dams?

choices.label: Placing fish repellents on dam turbines
Eliminating keystone species above the dam
Building fish ladders around the dam
Harvesting the fish before they reach the dam
Dredging the sediments upstream of the dam

content.answer: Building fish ladders around the dam

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
